product_details: Comfortable slim-fit jeans made from stretchable denim, available in dark blue and black.
Floral printed, sleeveless summer dress made from lightweight cotton fabric, perfect for casual outings.
Soft, fleece-lined unisex hoodie with front pocket and adjustable drawstring, available in multiple colors.
Classic men's leather jacket with zip closure, two front pockets, and a comfortable inner lining.
Elegant women's high heels with a 4-inch heel height, perfect for formal events or parties.
